Class SendRealEmail

java.lang.Object
application.SendRealEmail
All Implemented Interfaces:
EmailService
public class SendRealEmail extends Object implements EmailService
Utility implementation of EmailService that sends real emails via SMTP.

Credentials can be supplied via constructor parameters or environment variables (e.g., using dotenv), depending on the runtime configuration.

    SendRealEmail(String username, String password)
    Creates an email sender with the given credentials.
